subject: Cannot login - 2FA code not arriving
description: I have been trying to log into my account for the past 2 hours but the two-factor authentication code is not being sent to my phone. This is blocking my work.

subject: Billing: Double charged for annual subscription
description: I was charged twice on my credit card for the annual pro plan subscription. Transaction IDs are TXN-8821 and TXN-8822. Need immediate refund for the duplicate charge.

subject: Critical: Production API returning 500 errors
description: Our production API has been returning 500 internal server errors for the past 30 minutes. This is affecting all our customers. Error logs show database connection timeouts.

subject: Feature request: Dark mode for dashboard
description: It would be great if the dashboard had a dark mode option. This would help reduce eye strain when working late nights. Low priority enhancement.

subject: Bug: Session timeout after 10 minutes of inactivity
description: Users are getting automatically logged out after exactly 10 minutes of inactivity. Steps to reproduce: 1) Log in 2) Leave tab open without interaction 3) After 10 min session expires. Expected: 30 min timeout.

subject: API rate limit too restrictive for enterprise plan
description: Our application is constantly hitting the 100 requests/minute rate limit. We are on the enterprise plan and need this increased to at least 500 req/min to handle our traffic.

subject: Password reset email not received
description: I requested a password reset 3 times but never received the email. Checked spam folder. Cannot access my account. Please help urgently.

subject: Invoice #INV-2024-1234 shows incorrect amount
description: The invoice for January shows $500 but my plan is $299/month. Need corrected invoice for accounting purposes. This is blocking our payment processing.

subject: App crashes when uploading files larger than 50MB
description: The application crashes immediately when trying to upload files larger than 50MB. Browser console shows memory allocation error. Smaller files work fine.

subject: Request to delete account and all data per GDPR
description: I want to delete my account and all associated personal data in compliance with GDPR regulations. Please confirm data deletion within 30 days.

subject: Security vulnerability: Exposed API keys in client code
description: Found that API keys are being exposed in the client-side JavaScript bundle. This is a critical security issue that needs immediate attention.

subject: Feature: Export reports to PDF format
description: Would be helpful to export the analytics reports directly to PDF format instead of only CSV. This is needed for executive presentations.

subject: Cannot update profile information
description: When I try to update my profile information (name and email) the form shows a validation error even though all fields are correct. Tried multiple browsers.

subject: Payment failed with error code PAY-4001
description: My payment keeps failing with error code PAY-4001. Card is valid and has sufficient funds. Tried 3 different cards. Need assistance to complete subscription renewal.

subject: Search functionality returns no results
description: The search feature in the dashboard is not working. Typing any query returns zero results even though I know matching records exist. Started happening yesterday.

subject: Request API documentation for webhook integration
description: Need detailed API documentation for setting up webhook endpoints. Currently only basic REST API docs are available. This is required for our integration project.

subject: Mobile app not syncing with web dashboard
description: Changes made in the mobile app are not reflecting in the web dashboard. Data sync seems broken. Have to manually refresh multiple times.

subject: Feature: Multi-factor authentication options
description: Request to add more 2FA options beyond SMS. Support for authenticator apps like Google Authenticator or Authy would greatly improve security.

subject: Dashboard loading extremely slow
description: The dashboard takes 30-45 seconds to load. This started after the recent update. Network tab shows multiple API calls taking 10+ seconds each.

subject: Incorrect timezone display for timestamps
description: All timestamps in the application are showing in UTC instead of my local timezone (EST). Settings show correct timezone is selected but not being applied.

subject: Cannot cancel subscription
description: Trying to cancel my subscription but the cancel button in settings does nothing. No error message shown. Need to cancel before next billing cycle.

subject: CSV export truncating data after 1000 rows
description: When exporting data to CSV the file only contains the first 1000 rows even though the dataset has 5000 records. Need complete export functionality.

subject: Feature request: Bulk edit functionality
description: Would be very useful to have bulk edit capability to update multiple records at once instead of editing them one by one. This would save significant time.

subject: Login stuck in infinite redirect loop
description: After entering correct credentials the page gets stuck in an infinite redirect loop between /login and /dashboard. Have to clear cookies to try again.

subject: Critical: Database backup failed last 3 nights
description: Our automated database backups have been failing for the past 3 nights. Error logs show insufficient storage space. This is a critical data safety issue.

subject: Custom domain not working with SSL certificate
description: Set up custom domain but getting SSL certificate error. The provided documentation does not cover troubleshooting. Need assistance configuring SSL properly.

subject: Notification emails going to spam folder
description: All notification emails from the platform are ending up in spam folder. This causes me to miss important alerts. Other emails from different senders work fine.

subject: Feature: Integration with Slack for notifications
description: Request integration with Slack to receive real-time notifications. Would greatly improve team collaboration and response times.

subject: Report generation failing with timeout error
description: When generating monthly reports the process times out after 60 seconds with error code REP-TIMEOUT. Reports for shorter periods work fine.

subject: Cannot add team members to workspace
description: Trying to invite team members but the invite emails are not being sent. No error message shown but invitations never arrive. Checked spam folders.

subject: Mobile app crashes on iOS 17
description: The mobile app crashes immediately on launch on iOS 17 devices. Works fine on iOS 16. Started happening after the latest app update.

subject: Request increase in file storage quota
description: Current 10GB storage quota is insufficient for our needs. Request increase to at least 50GB or provide option to purchase additional storage.

subject: API response missing required fields
description: The API response for GET /users endpoint is missing the email and phone fields that are documented. This breaks our integration.

subject: Minor UI bug: Button alignment on mobile
description: The submit button on mobile devices is misaligned and partially hidden behind the footer. Low priority cosmetic issue but affects user experience.

subject: Request for bulk user import from CSV
description: Need ability to import multiple users at once from CSV file. Currently have to add 200+ users manually which is very time consuming.

subject: Webhook delivery failing with 401 unauthorized
description: Our webhook endpoint is receiving 401 unauthorized errors even though the authentication token is correct. Started failing yesterday without any changes on our end.

subject: Dashboard charts showing incorrect data
description: The revenue chart on the dashboard is showing incorrect values. When I check the raw data in reports the numbers are correct but the chart is wrong.

subject: Cannot download invoice PDFs
description: Clicking the download button for invoices does nothing. Browser console shows 404 error. Need invoices for tax filing.

subject: Feature: Advanced search filters
description: Request more advanced search filters including date ranges and custom field filters. Current basic search is too limited for our use case.

subject: Email verification link expired
description: Clicked the email verification link but it shows as expired. Account is locked until email is verified. Need new verification link sent.

subject: Performance degradation during peak hours
description: Application becomes very slow and sometimes unresponsive during peak hours (9am-11am EST). Response times are 5-10x slower than off-peak times.

subject: Request to change account email address
description: Need to change my account email from old company email to personal email. Current system does not allow email changes in settings.

subject: Two-factor authentication backup codes not working
description: None of my backup codes for 2FA are working. Tried all 10 codes. Cannot access account. Lost my phone so cannot receive SMS codes.

subject: Feature: Calendar integration for scheduling
description: Would be useful to have calendar integration (Google Calendar Outlook) for scheduling and reminders. This would streamline our workflow significantly.

subject: Cannot upload profile picture
description: Trying to upload a profile picture but getting an error Upload failed: Invalid file type. Tried both JPG and PNG formats which should be supported.

subject: API rate limit headers incorrect
description: The X-RateLimit-Remaining header is showing inconsistent values. Sometimes shows negative numbers. Makes it impossible to properly implement rate limit handling in our app.

subject: Request white-label branding options
description: Looking for white-label branding options to customize the platform with our company logo and colors. Is this available on enterprise plan?

subject: Password requirements too restrictive
description: The password policy requires 16+ characters with special characters. This is overly restrictive and causing issues for users. Consider more balanced requirements.

subject: Export to Excel format not working
description: The Export to Excel button downloads a file but Excel cannot open it shows file is corrupted. CSV export works fine. Need working Excel export.

subject: Suggestion: Add keyboard shortcuts for common actions
description: Adding keyboard shortcuts for common actions like save Ctrl+S or search Ctrl+F would greatly improve productivity for power users.
